meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Alec Fischthal Emily LaMonica Connor Pierce Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7404.

div.div:
2016 Teen Tournament semifinal game 2.
From DAR Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C.

td.p: Alec Fischthal, a junior from North Woodmere, New York
Emily LaMonica, a senior from Sayreville, New Jersey
Connor Pierce, a freshman from Dallas, Texas

tr.td: NEVER PRESIDENT
ANNUAL EVENTS
EXTREME GEOGRAPHY
MOVIE VILLAINS
TEXTING
IT'S "LIT"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This vice president starred in an Oscar-winning documentary & won a Nobel prize, but missed out on the White House')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: This vice president starred in an Oscar-winning documentary & won a Nobel prize, but missed out on the White House

Emily

(Alex: To honor the National Park Services' centennial year, we have a whole category devoted to...)
